title: Looking for a Graphic Designer.
body:
Looking for a Graphic Designer that can make me a high quality league of legends Youtube banner, profile picture and logo I will be paying in RP (amount $30). My Youtube name is Vallion. My prefered colors are Blue, Orange or Green. Preferably Orange or Green.

Add me on league: HanDuoQueue

Thank you

replies.body: They often say "starting from  $6" but that is for a simple package.  $30 would get you something decent.  $100 would be great.
So is this a person or a website?

> [{quoted}](name=JohnnyTheGaybo,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=zFnqt7Zb,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-12-30T04:13:08.024+0000)
>
> So is this a person or a website?

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=fiverr+logo+design

http://lp.fiverr.com/lp-go-logo3/?u_sou=google&u_med=cpc&u_cam=G_AU_Brand_BMM&u_ter=Fiverr_Logo_BMM&u_con=AdID%5e92616261071%5eKeyword%5e%2Bfiverr%20%2Blogo%20%2Bdesign%5ePlacement%5e%5eDevice%5ec&gclid=CjwKEAiAqJjDBRCG5KK6hq_juDwSJABRm03hqdYj7jpuFRo696GHUd66cmaTS1-VdXLAXDnhcTmvARoCAHTw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds
You might want to get in touch with **LGC Elam**. [Here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/4AAGmw8d-league-themed-twitter-banners-i-recently-made)'s some of his past work.
How would i get in touch with him? Thank you

Just adding him in-game or [tweeting at him](https://twitter.com/ElamGraphics) should work fine. He's online pretty frequently from what I see, so if you send him a message he should replay to it pretty quickly :D
I've used fiverr before and was happy with the result but you may need a slightly bigger budget.
